title: "Therapixel receives FDA clearance for use of its AI-based breast cancer screening software MammoScreen® on Digital Breast Tomosynthesis"
excerpt: "Therapixel, a company leading the use of AI-based products for women's health, announces it has received a second 510 (k) clearance from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for MammoScreen®, the explainable and actionable Artificial Intelligence (AI) based software assisting Radiologists in breast cancer screening."
